description: This file contains a unit test for the ISO639 language code handling, using Google Test framework. It verifies the behavior of the Language class, including validity checks and retrieval of language codes and descriptions.

classes.name: Language
classes.description: A class representing language codes and details, used in the tests to verify language validity, code retrieval, and description.

methods.name: Language()
methods.description: Default constructor for the Language class.

methods.name: Language(const std::string& code)
methods.description: Constructor initializing Language object with a language code string.

methods.name: Language(int id)
methods.description: Constructor initializing Language object with an ID.

methods.name: bool IsValid() const
methods.description: Checks if the language object represents a valid language.

methods.name: const char* Description() const
methods.description: Provides a description of the language.
